title.value: Map - Add Pin To Map By Clicking On Map

description.value: A user should be able to add a pin to a map on the Edit Panel by clicking the map and see the pin on Edit Panel, Stage, and Storefront.

comment.userInput: Add Pin To Map By Clicking
Stage: Verify Map Has Pin After Save
Edit Panel: Verify Coordinates After Save

title.value: Map - Add Pin To Map By Inputting Coordinates

description.value: A user should be able to add a pin to a map on the Edit Panel by inputting coordinates and see the pin on Edit Panel, Stage, and Storefront.

comment.userInput: Input Coordinates To Add Pin To Map
Stage: Verify Map Has Pin After Save
Edit Panel: Verify Coordinates After Save

title.value: Map - Cannot Add Pin To Map In Stage Or Store Front

description.value: A user should not be able to add a pin to a map from the Stage nor the store front.

title.value: Map - Move Map Pin By Clicking On Map

description.value: A user should be able to move a map pin by clicking on the map on the Edit Panel

comment.userInput: Edit Panel: Verify Pin Location Moved
Stage: Verify Pin Location Moved After Save
Edit Panel: Verify Pin Location Moved After Save

title.value: Map - Move Map Pin By Changing Coordinates

description.value: A user should be able to move a map pin by changing the coordinates on the Edit Panel

comment.userInput: Move Map Pin By Changing Coordinates
Edit Panel: Verify Pin Location Moved
Stage: Verify Pin Location Moved After Save
Edit Panel: Verify Pin Location Moved After Save

title.value: Map - Move Map Pin By Dragging And Dropping Pin

description.value: A user should be able to move a map pin by dragging and dropping the pin on the Edit Panel

comment.userInput: Move Map Pin By Dragging And Dropping Pin
Edit Panel: Verify Pin Location Moved
Stage: Verify Pin Location Moved After Save
Edit Panel: Verify Pin Location Moved After Save

title.value: Map - Move Map Pin By Dragging And Dropping Pin Off Of Map

description.value: A user should be able to move a map pin by dragging and dropping the pin off of the map on the Edit Panel

comment.userInput: Move Map Pin By Dragging And Dropping Pin Off Of Map
Edit Panel: Verify Pin Location Moved
Stage: Verify Pin Location Moved After Save
Edit Panel: Verify Pin Location Moved After Save

title.value: Map - Add Pin Then Remove Then Add and Verify

description.value: Make sure the user can add a map after adding a map and then removing it.

comment.userInput: Add Pin To Map After Error

title.value: Map - Open and Close Map Pin Tooltip

description.value: Verify that the user can open and close the map pin tooltip window and that the tooltip window stays open as a user moves the map.

comment.userInput: Stage: Tooltip Stays Open When Map Moves
Stage: Tooltip Stays Open When Map Moves After Save
Storefront: Tooltip Stays Open When Map Moves After Save

title.value: Map - Pin Tooltip All Location Data

description.value: Verify tooltip with all location data appears on Stage and Storefront but not Edit Panel.

comment.userInput: Verify No Tooltip On Edit Panel
